system.description: On a natural attack roll of 19-20, target swallowed and shunted to sandsquidâ€™s primary stomach. Total darkness inside and [[/r 2d10]] damage per round. Target can escape primary stomach with a DC 10 STR or DEX check and move into one of the many cave-like cavities within sandsquid (target no longer takes damage each round). A creature with a cutting weapon can cut its way out of the sandsquid by dealing 30 points of damage to it from within.
